      <T extends GamePacket>
      void      		 sendPacket​(org.bukkit.entity.Player target, T packet)
      Send this packet's wrapper to a Player, basically call : ((CraftPlayer)player).getHandle().playerConnection.sendPacket(packet);
      void subscribeHandler​(PacketHandler<? extends GamePacket> handler)
      Register the givan packet handler
      void unsubscribeHandler​(PacketHandler<? extends GamePacket> handler)
      Unregister the given handler, the PacketHandler.handlePacket(PacketEvent) won't be longer notified
